add_subdirectory(fmt)

set(LIEF_PYTHON_API OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_USE_CCACHE OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_ELF ON CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_PE OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_MACHO OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_OAT OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_DEX OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_VDEX OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_ART OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(LIEF_DOC OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(UNITTEST OFF CACHE BOOL "")
set(SPDLOG_FMT_EXTERNAL ON CACHE BOOL "")
set(SPDLOG_FMT_EXTERNAL_HO OFF CACHE BOOL "")

add_subdirectory(LIEF)

add_subdirectory(mio)

add_subdirectory(scope-guard)
